statements: SELECT * FROM water_consumption_data;
SELECT municipality_id, consumption_amount FROM water_consumption_data;
SELECT municipality_id, residential_consumers, commercial_consumers, industrial_consumers FROM water_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM water_consumption_data WHERE consumption_amount > 100;
SELECT municipality_id, commercial_consumers FROM water_consumption_data WHERE residential_consumers < 50;
SELECT municipality_id, consumption_amount FROM water_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM water_consumption_data WHERE consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT municipality_id, residential_consumers, commercial_consumers FROM water_consumption_data WHERE industrial_consumers > 10;
SELECT municipality_id, residential_consumers, commercial_consumers, industrial_consumers FROM water_consumption_data ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT municipality_id, residential_consumers, commercial_consumers, industrial_consumers FROM water_consumption_data WHERE residential_consumers > commercial_consumers;
SELECT * FROM municipalities;
SELECT name, region FROM municipalities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, consumption_volume, consumption_date FROM municipalities JOIN water_consumption_data ON municipalities.id = water_consumption_data.municipality_id;
SELECT * FROM water_consumption_data WHERE consumption_volume > 500;

SELECT id, name, region, consumption_volume, consumption_date FROM municipalities JOIN water_consumption_data ON municipalities.id = water_consumption_data.municipality_id ORDER BY consumption_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM municipalities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, region FROM municipalities WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT id, consumption_volume, consumption_date FROM water_consumption_data WHERE consumption_volume > 1000;
SELECT name, consumption_volume FROM municipalities JOIN water_consumption_data ON municipalities.id = water_consumption_data.municipality_id WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT region, SUM(consumption_volume) AS total_consumption FROM municipalities JOIN water_consumption_data ON municipalities.id = water_consumption_data.municipality_id GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM municipalities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, population FROM municipalities WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT * FROM consumption_data WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT municipality_id, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM consumption_data GROUP BY municipality_id;
SELECT name, implementation_date FROM municipalities INNER JOIN conservation_measures ON municipalities.id = conservation_measures.municipality_id ORDER BY implementation_date;
SELECT * FROM municipalities WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, region, population FROM municipalities WHERE region = 'North' ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT m.name, cd.date, cd.water_usage FROM municipalities m JOIN consumption_data cd ON m.id = cd.municipality_id WHERE cd.water_usage > 100 ORDER BY cd.date DESC;

SELECT m.name, cm.measure_description, cm.implementation_date FROM municipalities m JOIN conservation_measures cm ON m.id = cm.municipality_id WHERE cm.implementation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT m.name, cm.measure_description, cm.implementation_date, cd.water_usage FROM municipalities m JOIN conservation_measures cm ON m.id = cm.municipality_id JOIN consumption_data cd ON m.id = cd.municipality_id WHERE m.region = 'South' AND cd.water_usage < 50 ORDER BY m.name ASC, cd.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM municipality;
SELECT id, name, population FROM municipality WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT * FROM water_meter ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT m.name, w.usage_date, u.usage_gallons FROM municipality m, water_meter w, water_usage u WHERE m.id = w.municipality_id AND u.meter_id = w.id;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM conservation_measures ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM municipality WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT meter_number, installation_date FROM water_meter WHERE municipality_id = 1 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM conservation_measures WHERE id = 2;
SELECT m.name, w.usage_date, w.usage_gallons FROM municipality m JOIN water_meter w ON m.id = w.municipality_id WHERE w.usage_gallons > 500 ORDER BY w.usage_date;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE usage_gallons BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM municipalities;
SELECT name, population FROM municipalities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT source_name FROM water_sources WHERE type = 'River';
SELECT * FROM consumption_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT measure_name, description FROM conservation_measures WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM municipalities;
SELECT name, population FROM municipalities WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT source_name, type FROM water_sources WHERE type = 'River';
SELECT consumption, record_date FROM consumption_records WHERE consumption > 500 ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM conservation_measures WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
